name: Sanjeev Agrawal
overview: Sanjeev is the founder of collegefeed. Before collegefeed, Sanjeev was CEO of Aloqa, a mobile push platform (acquired by Motorola) Head of Product Marketing for Google, and VP Products and Marketing at Tellme Networks (acquired by Microsoft). Sanjeev is also an advisor to SocialTwist, the leading enterprise SAAS platform for social marketing. He holds a BS and MS in EECS from MIT, spent 4 years as a management consultant at McKinsey &Co., and 3 at Cisco Systems. He pretends to play squash when not chasing down his 3 year old for exercise.
